name: hugo-butterfly-site
description: Example website for Hugo Butterfly theme with multi-language support

scripts.build: pnpm run install:theme && hugo --minify && pnpm --prefix themes/hugo-butterfly exec pagefind --site ../../public --output-subdir _pagefind --force-language zh --root-selector main
scripts.build:dev: pnpm run install:theme && hugo && pnpm --prefix themes/hugo-butterfly exec pagefind --site ../../public --output-subdir _pagefind --force-language zh --root-selector main

author: Hugo Butterfly
